price: 31 contrairement à ceux qui recherchent d’autres relations, qui seuls se rendent coupables d’un péché.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
